i honestly don't understand the problem. elves are only "invincible" 
in forests under certain circumstances.

1) forest of any size without any attacks but normal attacks.
The solution? get an explosive weapon, heartburst, chain lightning, 
whirlwind, ghosts, fairies, your own elves, or poison cloud. there 
could even be other attacks i'm not aware of.

2) forest of a size where explosive attacks can no longer reach elves.
All the other attacks stand as reasonable attacks to finish off the 
lil buggers.

The problem seems to be if you have no mages, archmages, soldiers, 
ghosts, clerics, fairies, druids, elves or thieves. Thus it seems the 
problem is not much of a problem at all. The reasonable choice, then, 
would be to make elves' attacks weaker as they travel through 
forests, which makes sense as trees do not generally stand aside for 
rocks.

-Oldschool
